title: Mini Lee Sin Escape Mechanics Guide

embed.description: Hey Guys, this week we will be learning about Lee Sin's Mechanics for escaping in lane. These are just a few basic examples to show you guys so you can experiment with them yourself. Hope the guide is useful to those of you who've just started playing Lee Sin.

body:
Hey Guys, this week we will be learning about Lee Sin's Mechanics for escaping in lane. 

These are just a few basic examples to show you guys so you can experiment with them yourself. 

Hope the guide is useful to those of you who've just started playing Lee Sin. 

Happy Lee Sinning
-XSirCution

{{champion:64}}

replies.body: Go back to shaco my fren!
This was a good Lee Sin!!!! hehe.
